Text: PLLLLLEASE!! What a lousy film, here you have a bucket full of dramatic possibilities on the flood disaster but actually you end up with this cheap baby hijack plot, what a profound bad scenario move !
Yeah thanks for the review - I'm sure you've written it exactly where it will be read by all.
